channel.title: Is it illegal to DoS a website in the United States?
channel.description: My teacher made this website for us to get our assignments from and work on and I was talking to some friends about DoS'ing his website JUST FOR A PRANK. Because if I DoS it, we won't have to go to the websites and get assignments and all of that school stuff. :P But before I do anything I want to know if DoS'ing a website in the United States is illegal.

item.title: Is it illegal to DoS a website in the United States?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

A DoS attack is not funny.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it illegal to DoS a website in the United States?

item.title: Is it illegal to DoS a website in the United States?
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

It is, however, if you do it smart (via botnet), there is a small chance of being caught, however, by telling your friends, you’ve risen the chances.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it illegal to DoS a website in the United States?
